title.narrative: Livestock: Livestock and Market Development Programme II

description.narrative: The goal of the programme is to contribute to the reduction in poverty and enhanced economic growth in pasture communities. The programme development objective is to improve livestock productivity and to enhance climate resilience of pasture communities reflected in improved and equitable returns to livestock farmers

name.narrative: Livestock: Livestock and Market Development Programme II

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
